p:
In this section and section 52, occupational pension scheme, PRSA and trust RAC have the meaning given by section 2(1) of the Pensions Act 1990, and PEPP has the same meaning as in Regulation (EU) No. 2019/1238 of the European Parliament and Council of 20 June 2019 1
1 OJ No. L198, 25.7.2019. p.1..
